post.body: I had my ring in for repair and he had a pair of pants at the tailor. I picked up both and coffee - that was it!
what wine goes with sugar cookies?
Bring the milk! LOL
I forgot - Happy Festivus for the rest of us! LMAO
Merry Christmas to those that celebrate - Even if you don't may you have a peaceful and wonderful day.
Stuffed artichokes and crab cakes for dinner.... The artichokes are not the only thing stuffed!
Food shopping tonight - BJ's tomorrow. Hubby is off 2 weeks so I need to lay in some food. It is cheaper when he is at work! They feed him!
Made it back with all of my limbs intact... missing a few bucks but not too bad.. LOL
going to brave the elements... list in hand - route in hand... wish me luck - I'm going to the Mall... (que eerie music)..
Henna is very festive - green when it goes on and reddish when it comes off.
Baby its cold outside! A perfect day for inside chores... If December is like this what is January going to be like... I shudder to think..
Anyone use Thunderbird email client? I would like something to condense all of my email accounts...
Easy come easy go - it is raining out and there goes our pristine snow! It is a good day to stay inside.
sugar cookies rolled, sprinkled and baked... hubby has eaten about 1/2 dozen already... I musta done sumthin right! LOL
3 dz M&M cookies done - waiting for the sugar cookie batter to cool to roll and cut them out... right now I am dusting... I hate to dust
Whooot my bro is now on FB! Now to get my Mom on there.... Ain't technology grand. It is all about family isn't it.
Tomorrow - cookie baking.... wish I had someone to share it with. It is definitely more fun with another person... hubby doesn't count! LOL
My lawn was pristine white for all of an hour or so.... and then the dogs got to it - they had a blast in the snow... no more pristine lawn.
Snow and messes..... oh what fun it is to ride on a ice slicked road tonight! LOL I'm home and staying here...
Feeling very uninspired this year about gifts and gift-giving. That is not like me....
